ruleset.name: ticbuild
ruleset.description: These are rules which apply to the build at https://cvs.ultralog.net. Actually, that build contains this ruleset as well as unusedcode.xml, design.xml, and cougaar.xml

rule.name: EmptyCatchBlock
rule.description: Empty Catch Block, will find instances where an exception is caught, but nothing is done. In most circumstances, this swallows an exception which should either be acted on or reported.

rule.name: EmptyIfStmt
rule.description: Empty If Statement, will find instances where a condition is checked, but nothing is done about it.

rule.name: EmptyWhileStmt
rule.description: Empty While Statement, will find all instances where a while statement does nothing. If it is a timing loop, then you should use Thread.sleep() for it; if it's a while loop that does a lot in the exit expression, rewrite it to make it clearer.

rule.name: IfElseStmtsMustUseBracesRule
rule.message: Avoid using 'if...else' statements without curly braces
rule.description: Avoid using if..else statements without using curly braces

rule.name: UnnecessaryConversionTemporaryRule
rule.message: Avoid unnecessary temporaries when converting primitives to Strings
rule.description: Avoid unnecessary temporaries when converting primitives to Strings
